meta.description: R is a language and environment for statistical computing and graphics
meta.long_description:
R is a language and environment for statistical computing and
graphics. It is a GNU project which is similar to the S language.
R provides a wide variety of statistical (linear and nonlinear
modelling, classical statistical tests, time-series analysis,
classification, clustering, ...) and graphical techniques, and is
highly extensible.
meta.name: r-lang
